content: what does 10,000 messages of search history really mean in the plan? Only 10,000 messages will be public or a searching will only returns 10,000 record?

@csmoe: only the last 10,000 messages will be accessible via search. So if you search for something that appeared 2000, 7000, and 15000 messages ago, a search will only return 2 results.

Does that make sense?
